cast.overview: After proving himself on the field of battle in the French and Indian War, Benjamin Martin wants nothing more to do with such things, preferring the simple life of a farmer. But when his son Gabriel enlists in the army to defend their new nation, America, against the British, Benjamin reluctantly returns to his old life to protect his son.
cast.title: The Patriot

details.biography: Kirk Fox (born August 26, 1969) is an American actor, screenwriter, and stand-up comedian. On screen, he is best known for his recurring roles as Sewage Joe in Parks and Recreation, Kenny Boy in Reservation Dogs, and Pat McCurdy in Jury Duty. He has also appeared in numerous films including Wyatt Earp (1994), The Postman (1997), The Patriot (2000), and Forgetting Sarah Marshall (2008). Fox was previously married to director/actress Alison Eastwood from 1999 to 2000 and has been married to Jaren Boczan since 2017.
details.name: Kirk Fox
